headline: Chinese chip equipment supplier SiCarrier's unit launches EDA software
summary: A subsidiary of SiCarrier - a semiconductor equipment maker backed by the Shenzhen municipal government and works with Huawei Technologies - has released proprietary electronic design automation (EDA) software, bolstering China's broader push towards technology self-reliance. Qiyunfang, the SiCarrier unit, on Wednesday launched two EDA products - one for schematic capture and another for printed circuit board (PCB) design - at the three-day WeSemiBay Semiconductor Ecosystem Expo 2025 in Shenzhen
